Salandit (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0756: Shiinotic
Pokémon
#0758: Salazzle →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Salandit (TCG Pocket).

Salandit has been featured on 14 different cards since it debuted in the Guardians Rising expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Salandit cards are normally Fire-type or Darkness-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Salandit

Salandit
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
Card Type Mark English
Expansion 		Rarity # Japanese
Expansion 		Rarity #

        Facing a New Trial   008/049
        GX Battle Boost   018/114
Salandit SM Black Star Promos   SM154 SM-P Promotional cards   046/SM-P
Salandit         Ash vs Team Rocket Deck Kit   009/026
Salandit Crimson Invasion 46/111 Awakened Heroes 026/050
Salandit Ultra Prism 25/156 Ultra Sun 022/066
Salandit Dragon Majesty 13/70 Dragon Storm 009/053
Salandit Unbroken Bonds 30/214 Double Blaze 017/095
        Tag All Stars   026/173
Salandit Unified Minds 33/236 Sun & Moon Family Pokémon Card Game   011/051
Salandit Unified Minds 98/236 TAG TEAM GX Starter Sets   006/031
Salandit Sword & Shield 027/202 Sword 008/060
Salandit Battle Styles 027/163 Single Strike Master 013/070
        Start Deck 100   068/414
Salandit Crown Zenith 027/159 Incandescent Arcana 020/068
Salandit Obsidian Flames 139/197 Triplet Beat 060/073
        Darkness Houndoom ex Start Deck   074/139
Salandit Stellar Crown 023/142 Stellar Miracle 013/102
